name: radioactivity_concentration_of_246Cm_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Cm" means the element "curium" and "246Cm" is the isotope "curium-246" with a half-life of 2.01e+06 days.
